name: Farlands
description:
Farlands is a planned game by Lijah (me) , it is set to be an adventure game where you just simply complete quests but once you reach a certain point you start to realize that your reality is colliding with another and your realities timeline changes and you have to completely rebuild, offering both a survival and a sandbox mode, easy, medium and hard difficulties and an in depth storyline.

There is currently no timed release date.
